H559.def: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

H7650.def: = action by which humans or deities make a solemn statement often calling on a higher power to confirm that what is said is true or to punish the speaker if it turns out not to be true

H779.def: = to consign someone or something to death, damage, or destruction, usually by invoking the name of a deity if the agent is human; ◄ this is done as punishment, out of contempt, anger, or hostility, or because one was hired to do so

H1144.def: = man (called {L:Ben-Oni<SDBH:בֶּן־אֹונִי>} by his mother), tribe, and territory; ◄ twelfth and last son of {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and second son of {L:Rachel<SDBH:רָחֵל>}; ► founder of one of the tribes of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}

162.dom: Names of People|Names of Groups|Names of Locations

H559.def: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

H3117.def: = the time of day that it is light, as opposed to the time that it is dark

H2282.def: = celebration, usually of a religious nature; ≈ associated with joy

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H7887.def: = man, possibly to be identified with {L:Shelah<SDBH:שֵׁלָה>}; ◄ son of {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>}׃ ► regarded as father of inhabitants of {L:Shiloh<SDBH:שִׁילֹה>}

H834.def: = a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

H6828.def: = a mountain, identified with Jebel ʾel-Aqraʿ ◄ in northern Syria, ► known by the Canaanites as the mountain of the gods

H1008.def: = town and cult centre, also referred to as {L:Beth-Aven<SDBH:בֵּית אָוֶן>} or simply {L:Aven<SDBH:אָוֶן>}; ◄ territory of {L:Ephraim<SDBH:אֶפְרַיִם>}, near the border of {L:Benjamin<SDBH:בִּנְיָמִן>}

H4217.def: literally: the rising  (of the sun): = a cardinal direction indicating the direction of the rising sun

H8121.def: = celestial body ► that marks day and night and produces warmth and light for the earth

H4546.def: = a relatively wide road or access ramp made by by covering the surface of the ground with thicks layers of sand

H5927.def: = process by which a substance or other object appears to move up by itself

H7927.def: = the upper part of the human body between the head and the chest; ≈ associated with heavy burdens, and, in a more figurative way, heave responsibilities

H5045.def: =  an area of land located in the south of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}, consisting of little vegetation and with very little annual rainfall; inhabited by numerous peoples - initially by the Canaanites in {L:Arad<SDBH:עֲרָד>} and the {L:Amelekites<SDBH:עֲמָלֵקִי>}, later, the people of {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>}

H3829.def: = yellow or reddish gum produced by the Boswellia tree, a shrub that reaches 3 m high, with multiple trunks and small greenish or white flowers; the gum comes out in drops from the branches; ◄ Boswellia sacra; ► ingredient of the incense burned in the tabernacle

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H1144.def: = man (called {L:Ben-Oni<SDBH:בֶּן־אֹונִי>} by his mother), tribe, and territory; ◄ twelfth and last son of {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and second son of {L:Rachel<SDBH:רָחֵל>}; ► founder of one of the tribes of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}

H559.def: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

H1980.def: = process by which liquids or other inanimate objects move from one place to another

H693.def: = to go to a location where one will not be readily seen by others; ► and wait there for an opportunity to seize or attack someone or do something else that is supposed to be done when nobody else can witness it

H3754.def: = field where {L:grapes<SDBH:עֲנָב>} are cultivated, growing on {L:vines<SDBH:גֶּפֶן>}; typically surrounded by a stone wall, and equipped with a {L:watchtower<SDBH:מִגְדָּל>} and a {L:wine press<SDBH:יֶקֶב>}

H7200.def: = process or action by which living creatures perceive something, primarily --though not necessarily exclusively-- with their eyes, either as a spontaneous incident or as the result of focusing the eyes on something

H518.def: = marker indicating that the event in focus has to be true before another event can take place

H1323.def: = direct or indirect female offspring of humans or animals, either biologically or through adoption

H7887.def: = man, possibly to be identified with {L:Shelah<SDBH:שֵׁלָה>}; ◄ son of {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>}׃ ► regarded as father of inhabitants of {L:Shiloh<SDBH:שִׁילֹה>}

H3318.def: = action by which humans, animals, or objects leave a certain place or position

H4246.def: = action by which humans dance a round dance; ≈ associated with joy

H802.def: = woman of marriagable age or older, whether married or not

H1980.def: = process by which liquids or other inanimate objects move from one place to another

H776.def: = the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land

H1144.def: = man (called {L:Ben-Oni<SDBH:בֶּן־אֹונִי>} by his mother), tribe, and territory; ◄ twelfth and last son of {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and second son of {L:Rachel<SDBH:רָחֵל>}; ► founder of one of the tribes of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}

H1.def: = direct male progenitor; ► who normally provides protection, care, instruction, and discipline; ≈ is usually regarded with respect and associated with wisdom, security, and comfort

H176.def: = particle linking two entities by which X and Y are alternative options that exclude each other

H251.def: = son of one's father, whether from the same mother or not

H7378.def: = action by which humans initiate a possible argument or conflict with other humans or with a deity by accusing them of wrongdoing or by taking action in a different way

H559.def: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

H2603.def: = state in which humans or deities are favorably disposed to (other) humans, and act accordingly

H4421.def: = armed conflict between different countries or different groups within a country

H2342.def: = action by which humans delay action until the right moment, with a certain amount of confidence that this moment will actually come

H834.def: = a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

H1497.def: = action by which humans take property unlawfully from a person or place, usually by force or threat of force

H1980.def: = process by which liquids or other inanimate objects move from one place to another

H7725.def: = action by which humans face a direction different from the one they were facing before

H5159.def: = process by which possessions are transferred from one generation to the next

H1129.def: = causative action by which humans perform construction activities, either in order to erect a new building or to rebuild or repair an existing one

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H5892.def: = relatively large and permanent population center, usually surrounded by a wall and surrounded by a number of dependent {L:villages<SDBH:חָצֵר>}, {L:settlements<SDBH:בַּת>}, and {L:pasturelands<SDBH:מִגְרָשׁ>}; ≈ associated with strength and security

H3427.def: = action by which humans assume a sitting position in a certain location and remain in that position for some time; ≈ sometimes associated with a certain status, role, or common activity

H369.def: = state in which an object or event is either absent or non-existant

H4428.def: = supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity
